base_description: Rectangular white shelf with modern design.
part_description: Features three upper cubbyholes and a large lower shelf. The cubbyholes are evenly spaced, rectangular, and positioned at the top. The lower shelf is wide, spanning the entire width of the unit.
internal_interaction_description: The three cubbyholes are aligned horizontally, providing separate storage spaces. The large lower shelf offers a unified space for larger items. The top surface can be used for additional display or storage. The structure is designed to evenly distribute weight across all parts, ensuring stability.
external_interaction_description: The shelf can be placed against a wall or used as a room divider. It interacts with external objects by providing storage and display space. People can use it to organize books, decor, or other items. Its modern design complements contemporary interiors.
